item.description:
This may be a long ride for some, but I noticed some Riders from R.I. in this Group.   If anyone knows of a Bike Shop, in the Foxboro Area, that would do a Clinic, please let me know and I'll let you Post-It.  

Free Repair Class - Get aquainted with your bike

If you've just purchased a new bike or have one you're determined to get more use of, there are a few  things you ought to know to maximize your time and pleasure on it. That's where Caster's Bicycle  steps  in.

We know it's a real bummer when you're a few miles away from home and get a flat tire but don't know how to fix it. Come to our free clinic to learn the basics about keeping your bike in tip top shape for miles to come.  No need to bring your bike. We have plenty here!

Here's what we'll be going over:

 Fixing a flat

 Quick brake and gear adjustments

 Improving your shift technique and more...

I attended this Clinic, a couple of years ago, and found it to be very informative.  I am going back, more as a refresher and to learn something I may have forgotten.  Whether you are a Newbie or an  Experienced Cyclist, you should get something out of it.  Plan to be there for at least 2 Hours. 

 

FYI:  They offer the Clinic, at least once a Month.  I want to go before the Weather gets nice & we can Ride at Night.
item.name: Bike Clinic
